author: FP Staff
title: Priyanka Chopra shares her ‘red hot’ look as Veronica Leeds in Baywatch: See the pic here
text:
Priyanka Chopra shares her 'red hot' look as Veronica Leeds in Baywatch: See the pic here FP Staff Feb, 23 2017 15:41:00 IST #Abaya #Baywatch #Baywatch revival #Dwayne johnson #Dwayne johnson baywatch #Priyanka chopra #Zac efron 
Priyanka Chopra just unveiled another poster for her upcoming Hollywood debut film Baywatch . 
Dwayne Johnson and Zac Efron star in the revival of the hit '90s TV show about bikinis and beaches in California and Priyanka Chopra stars as the main antagonist, Veronica Leeds, in the film. Though not much is known about the story-line of the film, we know that Dwayne Johnson plays the updated version of Mitch Buchannon (the character made famous by David Hasselhoff) who teams up with a new recruit (Zac Efron) to solve a series of crimes happening on the sunny beaches of California. Priyanka Chopra's Victoria Leeds is a club owner who is involved in these criminal activities in some way. 
Chopra presented her look as Veronica Leeds on Twitter with the caption: 'Being bad can be so good. Coming soon.. #VictoriaLeeds # Baywatch #may26th.'
